Package org.unibl.etf.epj2.serialization

Class VehicleSerialization

java.lang.Object
org.unibl.etf.epj2.serialization.VehicleSerialization
public class VehicleSerialization extends Object
The VehicleSerialization class provides methods for serializing and deserializing Vehicle objects. It is used to save and load vehicle data to and from binary files.

The class includes functionality to:

  • Serialize Vehicle objects that are associated with rentals that have malfunctions.
  • Deserialize Vehicle objects from files in a specific directory.

Serialized files are stored in a folder named with a ".ser" extension.

Author:
Tamara Kosovac

  • Method Details

    • serializeVehicle

      public static void serializeVehicle(List<Rental> rentals)
      Serializes a list of Rental objects. Vehicles associated with rentals that have a malfunction are saved to separate files in the "FolderWithSerializedVehicles" directory.

      Each vehicle is serialized into a file named with the vehicle's ID and the ".ser" extension.

      Parameters:
      rentals - The list of rentals to be processed for serialization.

    • deserializeVehicle

      public static List<Vehicle> deserializeVehicle()
      Deserialize Vehicle objects from files in the "FolderWithSerializedVehicles" directory.

      This method reads each file with a ".ser" extension and reconstructs the Vehicle objects.

      Returns:
      a list of deserialized damaged Vehicle objects
